metadata.transcript_file: 09-08 - 3 - Discovery Day 1, External Buyers & Sellers, Part 1.srt

references.context: Discussion about 'I need a part' as the first buyer action
references.key_quote: I need a part. That is the first phrase somebody says in their brain

references.context: Discussion about checking vendor responses and having options
references.key_quote: I need to check on responses... I have a lot of options here
I need to choose which vendor... I need to choose a vendor

references.context: Discussion about personas, external/internal buyers, admin vs user roles
references.key_quote: External buyer... Internal buyer... We're talking about user groups

references.context: Admin and user designators for all personas
references.key_quote: admin and user being the two designators... That would be for all of them

references.context: Discussion about vendor capabilities and 'within my capabilities' decision
references.key_quote: within my capabilities, what does that mean?

references.context: Internal buyers only working in Salesforce 360
references.key_quote: Internal buyers, the only screen they're working out of is in Salesforce 360... That's all they do

references.context: Discussion about web interface integration with Salesforce
references.key_quote: He would not know... he's using a web interface

references.context: FSE as different persona from buyer, completely different workflow
references.key_quote: field service, different than for a buyer... FSE and then procurement

uncategorized_insights.quote: platform admin? Yeah. That's exactly right
uncategorized_insights.context: Discussion about overall system/portal management separate from buyer/vendor

uncategorized_insights.insight: Biomed as completely different profile type
uncategorized_insights.quote: Would you park Biomed out differently... completely different profile type
uncategorized_insights.context: Biomed buyers need both DI and Biomed capabilities
Discussion about auto-sourcing flow currently in Salesforce

uncategorized_insights.insight: Current state vs future state mapping
uncategorized_insights.quote: we want to focus on current state, but also focus on future
uncategorized_insights.context: Team struggling with documenting what exists vs what should exist

potential_gaps.suggested_epic: New Epic or significant E01 extension
potential_gaps.business_impact: Different user group with unique needs

potential_gaps.description: Platform administration separate from buyer/vendor admin

personas_discussion.summary: Extensive discussion defining user personas: external/internal buyers, vendors, FSE, admin roles

buyer_workflow.summary: Core buyer journey: need part → check responses → choose vendor → submit order

system_architecture.summary: Integration between Salesforce 360 and new web interface
